meanings.definition: A mixture of equal amounts of enantiomers.
meanings.sent1: The chemist carefully measured the racemates to ensure the perfect balance of enantiomers.
meanings.sent2: The racemates in the flask contained an equal mix of mirror-image molecules.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the racemates danced together in perfect harmony.
